full_text:

Yes LC, I bought a select a tenna but it must be set for one channel and I think it is only for a.m.  I have tested it but don't notice a difference.  I have seen some of the homemade coil deals on the web...can't do that.  Any ideas, let me know.  Ron

LC Duplatt <lcdupla@...> wrote:          Ron, have you tried a boosted Am or FM antenna? ;)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ron Lederer <ronriko@...> wrote:
>
> Just found this about your new box. Looks and sounds promising. 
But I suppose in my Land-of-Weak-Signals I would get nothing. On the 
other hand, I almost feel I would sacrafice a volume of sessions and 
signals for good, clear, multi-word messages. I am getting EVP block 
because I am afraid I will get nothing during a session or, worse 
yet, I may be getting messages but I cannot hear or understand 
them...if you get my drift. Good stuff at your end. Ron L
> 
> LC Duplatt <lcdupla@...> wrote: I had posted this 
elsewhere, but thought I should post it here for 
> group fodder. The uploaded preceding files were from a new spirit 
box 
> I am testing that scans to strong signals only on the FM band, with 
> scan rate and range adjustments. This method is different sounding, 
> being somewhat choppy, but may yield clearer audio. The downside, 
as I 
> have been discussing elsewhere, may be the lack of weaker signals 
> between, and less white noise to be utilized. I'll keep working 
with 
> it and post my results as I have them. If spirits can manipulate 
> audio, then this method may have merit, too. ;)
> 
> LC
> http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ---------------------------------
> Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. 
Try it now.
>

Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
